articles.title: Miami Dolphins and general manager Chris Grier agree to part ways
articles.description:
Grier had been the Dolphins' GM since 2016 and in the organization since 2000.

The post Miami Dolphins and general manager Chris Grier agree to part ways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Miami Dolphins part ways with GM Chris Grier after seven years on October 31, 2025.
Grier served as GM since 2016 and was with the organization since 2000.
Boston fans may see changes in player trades impacting local NFL rivalries.
